Detailed Description

The Move class represents abstract moves.

Moves are independent of current position (no piece/check/capture flags are set). Both source and destination squares are represented as numbers 0..63.

Member Function Documentation

Square Move::castlingRookFrom (   )  const
 

Returns:
Square when rook was placed before castling

Square Move::castlingRookTo (   )  const
 

Returns:
Square when rook is placed after castling

Square Move::enPassantSquare (   )  const
 

Returns:
Square when en-passant is captured. Undefined if there is no en-passant.

bool Move::isValid (   )  const
 

Check whether move is valid.

The only checks that are done are: whether squares are within range (0..63) and whether from differs from to.

Piece Move::promotionPiece (   )  const
 

If move is promotion, get promotion piece.

Result is undefined if there is no promotion

Check whether two moves are the same.

Moves are considered the same, if both from and to are equal
